icd10_codes.description: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease with acute exacerbation
icd10_codes.evidence: 72-year-old male with a history of COPD presents with worsening shortness of breath
increased cough with greenish sputum production and Chest X-ray shows hyperinflation and patchy infiltrates in the right lower lobe
presents with worsening shortness of breath over the past 3 days
wheezing. Physical exam reveals diffuse wheezing
increased cough with greenish sputum production
O2 sat 88% on room air. ABG shows PaO2 58 mmHg
